CustomField.formula: VALUE(BLANKVALUE(TEXT(Greeting_and_Introduction__c), '0'))+ VALUE(BLANKVALUE(TEXT(Language__c), '0'))+ VALUE(BLANKVALUE(TEXT(Control__c), '0'))+ VALUE(BLANKVALUE(TEXT(Tone_of_Voice__c), '0'))+ VALUE(BLANKVALUE(TEXT(Pacing__c), '0'))+ VALUE(BLANKVALUE(TEXT(Attitude__c), '0'))+ VALUE(BLANKVALUE(TEXT(Questioning__c), '0'))+ VALUE(BLANKVALUE(TEXT(Product_Knowledge__c), '0'))+ VALUE(BLANKVALUE(TEXT(Negotiation__c), '0'))+ VALUE(BLANKVALUE(TEXT(Urgency_and_Closing__c), '0'))
CustomField.label: Call Effectiveness Score
